reviewText: I have some of Nancy Evan's other pitching videos - this one is good.  But it's not for beginners.  Most of the drills are advanced - showing how to enhance various pitches - screwball, curveball, dropball, riseball, etc.  It does a good job on those, but my daughter is now at the fastball/changeup stage, so most of the drills aren't applicable yet.  I'll keep the video for when she gets further along.

excellent video,i was impressed. Nancy Patton gives a great explanation and demostration of step progresion to learning new pitches. She shows how it should feel and look. I will definetly buy the rest of her dvd series
